basics.name: Sotheara Chea
basics.title: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer building event-driven systems that scale. Passionate about distributed systems, cloud architecture, and solving complex problems through elegant code.

work.name: Travelers Insurance
work.summary: Building event-driven automation platforms processing 5M+ tasks/year for underwriting and support teams.
highlights: Architected event-driven automation platform processing 5M+ tasks/year, reducing processing times by 15%
Built high-throughput Kafka data pipeline on AWS EKS replicating 40,000 events/min with 99.9% reliability
Designed RESTful microservices using TypeScript, Node.js, and Docker enabling 3 external systems integration
Achieved 90%+ code coverage across 5 microservices using Jest and Mocha
Configured and managed 6+ Kafka topics supporting real-time event streaming for workflow progression
Deployed Istio service mesh to 2 production EKS clusters for improved observability and zero-downtime deployments
Mentored 2 junior engineers through code reviews and pair programming

work.name: Travelers Insurance
work.summary: Built analytics dashboard and competed in coding competitions.
highlights: Built Qlik dashboard integrating ETL framework data for business leaders
Competed in Python coding competition developing game tournament algorithm
